subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yankees second baseman Robinson Cano is more smooth and more athletic than the Red Sox’ Dustin Pedroia, but Pedroia has been the more accomplished player at the start of their careers.
snippet: Yankees second baseman Robinson Cano is more smooth and more athletic than the Red Sox’ Dustin Pedroia, but Pedroia has been the more accomplished player at the start of their careers.
